Title: last date to register for 53 AVP posts
Description: Bank of Baroda will close the online application process for the Assistant Vice President (AVP) post today. Apply at bankofbaroda.in till 11:59 pm.

Title: Apply for Developer, QAE, and other vacancies
Description: Bank of Baroda has begun the online application process for recruitment to various posts of IT professionals. Candidates can apply for the vacancies at bankofbaroda.in

Title: Bank of Baroda invites applications for 159 manager posts: Check how to apply
Description: Interested candidates can visit the official Bank of Baroda website — bankofbaroda.in/Career — to apply for the vacancies.

Title: Apply for 47 agriculture marketing officer posts at bankofbaroda.in
Description: The online registration process for the AMF posts started on 7 January and the last date to submit the applications is 27 January

Title: Bank of Baroda recruitment 2021: Vacancies open for 511 HR posts; check bankofbaroda.in for details
Description: The last date to apply is 29 April. Candidates are advised to check the eligibility criteria, age limit, and other important details on the official website
